name: Texas Back Road Racing
description:
Hit the streets of rural Texas and win the gold! Tracker Acely is back again, and has his eyes on winning the rare street trophies. Find your way small city to small city in search of these coveted prizes.

- Multi-Course tracks in rural Texas Cities

- Discover and Learn Real Facts about small Texas communities

- Music by Texas band Recreating Eden

- Twenty-three unique textured courses

- Random Track Order Crossroads

- Invisible Speed Ups

- Invisible hazards

- Different numbers of racers
